mapper.select: SELECT name, tel, address, location, time, etime, park, etc FROM market
mapper.update: UPDATE market set name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, location=#{location}, time=#{time}, etime=#{etime}, park=#{park}, etc=#{etc}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market (name, tel, address, location, time, etime, park, etc) VALUES(#{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{location}, #{time}, #{etime}, #{park}, #{etc})
